content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although our fictional character background doesn't allow personal interactions, let's focus on the negotiation for the apartment rental price. To begin with, I have this exquisite 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the heart of Duisburg's city center, moments away from essential facilities. Now, let me hear your proposed price to kickstart our discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to propose a price of 500 euros for the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your interest in my property, Farhad, but at this moment, I find your offer insufficient. My expectations are higher considering the apartment's prime location and modernity.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I would like to make a counter-offer of 450 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While I acknowledge your attempt to meet halfway, I'm still reluctant to accept such a figure. Let's explore other possibilities to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. I would like to make another counter-offer of 475 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Although slightly improved, this proposal still falls short of my expectations. I'm inclined to wait for a more competitive offer from other potential tenants before reaching a decision. However, I'll keep your interest in mind and consider your offer if no better ones surface.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I would like to make a final offer of 480 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Having weighed your proposal against other options, I find your final offer more appealing. I agree to the price of 480 Euros for this apartment! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
